chapters.title: Prologue: Lightnings
chapters.info: Suladric, p. 37 (33)—Last true chief of the Shaido Aiel, and Sevanna's first husband. They were married when Sevanna was only sixteen. After his death, Muradin went to Rhuidean to become his successor and failed; Couladin then declared himself to be the chief of the Shaido despite being refused permission to enter Rhuidean. Suladric's death set off what may some day be called the Shaido War in Cairhien. See also Couladin; Muradin; Sevanna.
